Reviews.Title: Outstanding HD picture.  VG SD picture.  VG DVD.
Reviews.Author: P. Stein "Bengals Fan"
Reviews.Content: One year update.  Still works great.I just hooked up this TV to satellite with HD service.  HD picture is outstanding, and SD is very good.  DVD player is excellent.  Good sound. I wanted a built in DVD, so my grandson can watch his DVDs in the kitchen, rather than the big TV.Only a 90 day labor warranty, so consider an extended warranty.  My only complaint is that I can't get my Direct TV remote to turn the TV on/off.  Otherwise, controls the TV and DVD.  I'm thinking the DVD feature is confusing the remote.  The TV off switch defaults to DVD.  Easy to push the on/off button on the tv, so the problem is very minor.  Since I can control volume, I know I have the right code.This is my second HDTV.  Have Direct TV DVRs hooked on both, Both are 720 P.  Both have outstanding pictures.  A+++ on this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Excellent Tuner
Reviews.Author: R. Urchyk
Reviews.Content: This is my 5th attempt at HDTV. Every other one I tried received few of the digital transmissions available in my area. This RCA not only receives all local channels, but also digital channels from 60+ miles away as well. DVD is quiet and fast to load. Only complaint is the channel scan took quite a while to complete, maybe because I get so many channels. You won't regret this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good picture but lousy tuner
Reviews.Author: bonot1 "bonot1"
Reviews.Content: We bought this for $400.  It has some good qualities (DVDs work well) but the digital tuner is poor, or perhaps more accurately, hyper-sensitive.  If you're cheapskates like us and use an exterior antenna, I would skip this one.  It's on the same antenna feed as all of our other TVs and DTV Converter boxes, but this TV can maintain a digital signal on only 2 stations at our location.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed and wanted!
Reviews.Author: Minnesnowta
Reviews.Content: We live in a small apartment and regardless, the television will not be the focal point of our space. This TV/DVD unit does the trick! It has a very clear picture and doesn't call attention to itself when it's off.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: George Ruehling
Reviews.Content: A wonderful product.  Wanted a smaller HDTV for the bedroom that included a DVD player built-in and this one has proven to be just what we needed.
